text: Nur Zahirah MacWilson binti ZainolBiodata Zahirah Macwilson Pelakon Baru Drama Mr London Ms Langkawi Babab.Net. Retrieved 1 January 2017. (born 1 February 1995) is a Malaysian actress and model. ==Personal life== In December 2018, she was reported to be in relationship with singer and actor Aiman Hakim Ridza while both were acting in Curi-Curi Cinta, and confirmed their relationship. Zahirah and Aiman became engaged on 8 June 2019 in Perth, Australia.They tied the knot on 20 February 2020. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" |- style="text-align:center;" ! Year !
